column2: Mew is known to be the rarest Pokemon in gen 1. You need to trigger multiple events to encounter it.
Mewtwo is the strongest Pokemon in gen1.

column1: how can I heal my pokemon
column2: You can heal your Pokemon by using a potion or visiting a Pokemon Center.

column1: what are the types of pokeball
column2: They are Poke Ball, Great Ball, Ultra Ball and Master Ball.
You can buy items in Poke Mart.
